name: WH Game Jam Week 13
description:
This is my first game jam ever, man that was a stressful one hour. I even prepared an ice tea but only drank half of it because I was so focused.

The aliens increase in speed every 6 ""combo's"" (it was originally intended to be a combo meter, not enough time). Up to 100 combo they also increase in frequency.

All the assets, music and sprites were self made. The sprites were created during the 1 hour (pretty timewasting idea), the music was already available to me from a past project

My highest combo is 265 by the way, see if you can beat that.
